title: Hatem Ben Arfa
summary: Hatem Ben Arfa (Arabic: حاتم بن عرفة‎, French pronunciation: ​[atɛm bɛnaʁfa]; born 7 March 1987) is a French professional footballer who plays as a winger and attacking midfielder. Known for his dribbling ability,[3] he has been described as "one of the best-rated talents in France" but has been criticised by the media and players alike for lacking discipline.[4][5][6][7]
